account.editTipDesc: Leave API credential fields empty to keep unchanged. Enter new values to update API credentials.

accountList.editTipDesc: Leave API credential fields empty to keep unchanged. Enter new values to update API credentials.

accountImport.title: Import Account
accountImport.securityTipDesc: Private keys will be stored in the backend database. Please ensure database access is secure. HTTPS is recommended.
accountImport.privateKeyPlaceholder: Enter private key (64-character hex string, 0x prefix optional)
accountImport.privateKeyInvalid: Invalid private key format (should be 64-character hex string)
accountImport.walletAddressPlaceholder: Wallet address (will be derived from private key)
accountImport.walletAddressMismatch: Wallet address does not match private key
accountImport.mnemonicInvalid: Invalid mnemonic format (should be 12 or 24 words, space-separated)
accountImport.walletAddressMismatchMnemonic: Wallet address does not match mnemonic
accountImport.accountNameHelp: Used to identify account for management
accountImport.privateKeyHelp: Private key will be encrypted and stored, only used for signing transactions
accountImport.addressError: Cannot derive address from private key

proxySettings.hostInvalid: Please enter a valid host address

configPage.title: Global Configuration
configPage.description: Global configuration function has been migrated to the following pages:
configPage.templatesDesc: Manage copy trading parameters (ratio, amount, risk control, etc.)
configPage.copyTradingDesc: Associate accounts, templates and Leaders to enable copy trading relationships
configPage.systemSettingsDesc: Configure proxy, view API health status
configPage.footer: Please use the above pages for configuration management.

autoRedeem.title: Auto Redeem Configuration
autoRedeem.label: Enable Auto Redeem
autoRedeem.tooltip: When enabled, the system will automatically redeem all redeemable positions in all accounts. Requires Builder API Key configuration to take effect.
autoRedeem.builderApiKeyNotConfiguredDesc: Auto redeem feature requires Builder API Key configuration to take effect.
autoRedeem.saveFailed: Failed to save auto redeem configuration

builderApiKey.title: Builder API Key Configuration
builderApiKey.description: Builder API Key is a system-level configuration, not related to your account. It is an API credential for Polymarket's Builder service, used to execute Gasless (no gas fee) transactions.
builderApiKey.purpose1: Execute Gasless transactions: Operations like redeeming positions and creating orders don't require gas fees
builderApiKey.purpose2: Improve user experience: No need to prepare MATIC tokens in wallet for gas fees
builderApiKey.purpose3: Reduce transaction costs: Gas fees are covered by Builder service
builderApiKey.apiKeyHelp: Configured, enter new value to update
builderApiKey.secretHelp: Configured, enter new value to update
builderApiKey.passphraseHelp: Configured, enter new value to update
builderApiKey.saveSuccess: Builder API Key configuration saved successfully
builderApiKey.saveFailed: Failed to save Builder API Key configuration
builderApiKey.getFailed: Failed to get Builder API Key configuration
builderApiKey.notConfigured: Builder API Key not configured, please go to System Settings to configure
builderApiKey.notConfiguredError: Builder API Key not configured, cannot execute Gasless transactions. Please go to System Settings to configure Builder API Key.
builderApiKey.apiReferenceDesc: Learn more about Builder API usage:
builderApiKey.apiTestDesc: Test if Builder API is working correctly

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.firstUseDesc: Please use the reset key provided by the administrator to set the initial password
resetPassword.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters

leaderAdd.websiteInvalid: Please enter a valid URL address

userList.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
userList.updateOwnPasswordSuccess: Password updated successfully, please login again

templateList.title: Template Management
templateList.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this template?
templateList.deleteConfirmDesc: This action cannot be undone. Please ensure no copy trading relationships are using this template
templateList.fixedAmountRequired: Please enter fixed copy trading amount
templateList.fixedAmountError: Fixed amount must be >= 1, please re-enter

templateAdd.title: Create Copy Trading Template
templateAdd.templateNameTooltip: Unique identifier name for the template, used to distinguish different copy trading configuration templates. Template name must be unique and cannot duplicate other templates.
templateAdd.copyModeTooltip: Select the calculation method for copy amount. Ratio mode: copy amount changes proportionally with Leader order size; Fixed amount mode: copy amount remains fixed regardless of Leader order size.
templateAdd.copyRatioTooltip: Copy ratio represents the percentage of copy amount relative to Leader order amount. For example: 100% means 1:1 copy, 50% means half position copy, 200% means double copy
templateAdd.fixedAmountPlaceholder: Fixed amount, does not change with Leader order size, must be >= 1
templateAdd.fixedAmountError: Fixed amount must be >= 1, please re-enter
templateAdd.maxOrderSizeTooltip: In ratio mode, limits the maximum amount cap for single copy order, used to prevent excessive copy amount and control risk. For example: set to 1000, even if calculated copy amount exceeds 1000, it will be limited to 1000 USDC.
templateAdd.minOrderSizeTooltip: In ratio mode, limits the minimum amount floor for single copy order, used to filter out orders with too small amounts, avoiding frequent small trades. If filled, must be >= 1 USDC. For example: set to 10, if calculated copy amount is less than 10, skip this order.
templateAdd.minOrderSizePlaceholder: Only effective in ratio mode, must be >= 1 (optional)
templateAdd.maxDailyOrdersTooltip: Limits the maximum number of copy orders per day, used for risk control and preventing overtrading. For example: set to 50, when daily copy orders reach 50, stop copying, reset next day.
templateAdd.priceToleranceTooltip: Allowed adjustment range for copy price based on Leader price, used to adjust price within Leader price ± tolerance range to improve fill rate. For example: set to 5%, Leader price is 0.5, then copy price can be in 0.475-0.525 range.
templateAdd.minOrderDepthTooltip: Check total order amount (bids + asks) in orderbook to ensure sufficient liquidity. Leave empty to disable
templateAdd.minOrderDepthPlaceholder: For example: 100 (optional, leave empty to disable)
templateAdd.maxSpreadTooltip: Maximum spread (absolute price). Avoid copying in markets with excessive spreads. Leave empty to disable
templateAdd.maxSpreadPlaceholder: For example: 0.05 (5 cents, optional, leave empty to disable)
templateAdd.minOrderbookDepthTooltip: Minimum orderbook depth (USDC amount), NULL means this filter is not enabled. Check depth of first N levels
templateAdd.minOrderbookDepthPlaceholder: For example: 50 (optional, leave empty to disable)
templateAdd.priceRangeTooltip: Only copy orders where Leader's trade price is within the specified range. Leave empty to disable. Examples: Fill 0.11 and 0.89 means only copy orders with price between 0.11 and 0.89; Fill only max price 0.89 means only copy orders with price below 0.89; Fill only min price 0.11 means only copy orders with price above 0.11.
templateAdd.minPricePlaceholder: Min Price (leave empty for no limit)
templateAdd.maxPricePlaceholder: Max Price (leave empty for no limit)
templateAdd.supportSellTooltip: Whether to copy Leader's sell orders. Enabled: copy both Leader's buy and sell orders; Disabled: only copy Leader's buy orders, ignore sell orders.

templateEdit.title: Edit Copy Trading Template
templateEdit.templateNameTooltip: Unique identifier name for the template, used to distinguish different copy trading configuration templates. Template name must be unique and cannot duplicate other templates.
templateEdit.copyModeTooltip: Select the calculation method for copy amount. Ratio mode: copy amount changes proportionally with Leader order size; Fixed amount mode: copy amount remains fixed regardless of Leader order size.
templateEdit.copyRatioTooltip: Copy ratio represents the percentage of copy amount relative to Leader order amount. For example: 100% means 1:1 copy, 50% means half position copy, 200% means double copy
templateEdit.fixedAmountPlaceholder: Fixed amount, does not change with Leader order size, must be >= 1
templateEdit.fixedAmountError: Fixed amount must be >= 1, please re-enter
templateEdit.fixedAmountTooltip: In fixed amount mode, the fixed amount for each copy, does not change with Leader order size. Must be >= 1 USDC. For example: set to 10, then regardless of how much Leader buys, copy amount is always 10 USDC.
templateEdit.maxOrderSizeTooltip: In ratio mode, limits the maximum amount cap for single copy order, used to prevent excessive copy amount and control risk. For example: set to 1000, even if calculated copy amount exceeds 1000, it will be limited to 1000 USDC.
templateEdit.minOrderSizeTooltip: In ratio mode, limits the minimum amount floor for single copy order, used to filter out orders with too small amounts, avoiding frequent small trades. If filled, must be >= 1 USDC. For example: set to 10, if calculated copy amount is less than 10, skip this order.
templateEdit.minOrderSizePlaceholder: Only effective in ratio mode, must be >= 1 (optional)
templateEdit.maxDailyOrdersTooltip: Limits the maximum number of copy orders per day, used for risk control and preventing overtrading. For example: set to 50, when daily copy orders reach 50, stop copying, reset next day.
templateEdit.priceToleranceTooltip: Allowed adjustment range for copy price based on Leader price, used to adjust price within Leader price ± tolerance range to improve fill rate. For example: set to 5%, Leader price is 0.5, then copy price can be in 0.475-0.525 range.
templateEdit.minOrderDepthTooltip: Check total order amount (bids + asks) in orderbook to ensure sufficient liquidity. Leave empty to disable
templateEdit.minOrderDepthPlaceholder: For example: 100 (optional, leave empty to disable)
templateEdit.maxSpreadTooltip: Maximum spread (absolute price). Avoid copying in markets with excessive spreads. Leave empty to disable
templateEdit.maxSpreadPlaceholder: For example: 0.05 (5 cents, optional, leave empty to disable)
templateEdit.minOrderbookDepthTooltip: Minimum orderbook depth (USDC amount), NULL means this filter is not enabled. Check depth of first N levels
templateEdit.minOrderbookDepthPlaceholder: For example: 50 (optional, leave empty to disable)
templateEdit.priceRangeTooltip: Only copy orders where Leader's trade price is within the specified range. Leave empty to disable. Examples: Fill 0.11 and 0.89 means only copy orders with price between 0.11 and 0.89; Fill only max price 0.89 means only copy orders with price below 0.89; Fill only min price 0.11 means only copy orders with price above 0.11.
templateEdit.minPricePlaceholder: Min Price (leave empty for no limit)
templateEdit.maxPricePlaceholder: Max Price (leave empty for no limit)
templateEdit.maxPositionValueTooltip: Limit the maximum position value for a single market. If the current position value + copy order amount exceeds this limit, the order will not be placed. Leave empty to disable
templateEdit.maxPositionValuePlaceholder: For example: 100 (optional, leave empty to disable)
templateEdit.maxPositionCountTooltip: Limit the maximum position count for a single market. If the current position count reaches or exceeds this limit, the order will not be placed. Leave empty to disable
templateEdit.maxPositionCountPlaceholder: For example: 10 (optional, leave empty to disable)
templateEdit.supportSellTooltip: Whether to copy Leader's sell orders. Enabled: copy both Leader's buy and sell orders; Disabled: only copy Leader's buy orders, ignore sell orders.

copyTradingAdd.title: Add Copy Trading Config
copyTradingAdd.templateFilled: Template content filled, you can modify
copyTradingAdd.copyModeTooltip: Select the calculation method for copy amount. Ratio mode: copy amount changes proportionally with Leader order size; Fixed amount mode: copy amount remains fixed regardless of Leader order size.
copyTradingAdd.copyRatioTooltip: Copy ratio represents the percentage of copy amount relative to Leader order amount. For example: 100% means 1:1 copy, 50% means half position copy, 200% means double copy
copyTradingAdd.fixedAmountPlaceholder: Fixed amount, does not change with Leader order size, must be >= 1
copyTradingAdd.maxOrderSizeTooltip: In ratio mode, limits the maximum amount cap for single copy order
copyTradingAdd.minOrderSizeTooltip: In ratio mode, limits the minimum amount floor for single copy order, must be >= 1
copyTradingAdd.minOrderSizePlaceholder: Only effective in ratio mode, must be >= 1 (optional)
copyTradingAdd.maxDailyLossTooltip: Limits the maximum daily loss amount, used for risk control
copyTradingAdd.maxDailyOrdersTooltip: Limits the maximum number of copy orders per day
copyTradingAdd.priceToleranceTooltip: Allowed adjustment range for copy price based on Leader price
copyTradingAdd.delaySecondsTooltip: Copy delay time, 0 means copy immediately
copyTradingAdd.minOrderDepthTooltip: Check total order amount (bids + asks) in orderbook to ensure sufficient liquidity. Leave empty to disable
copyTradingAdd.minOrderDepthPlaceholder: For example: 100 (optional, leave empty to disable)
copyTradingAdd.maxSpreadTooltip: Maximum spread (absolute price). Avoid copying in markets with excessive spreads. Leave empty to disable
copyTradingAdd.maxSpreadPlaceholder: For example: 0.05 (5 cents, optional, leave empty to disable)
copyTradingAdd.minOrderbookDepthTooltip: Minimum orderbook depth (USDC amount), NULL means this filter is not enabled. Check depth of first N levels
copyTradingAdd.minOrderbookDepthPlaceholder: For example: 50 (optional, leave empty to disable)
copyTradingAdd.priceRangeTooltip: Only copy orders where Leader's trade price is within the specified range. Leave empty to disable. Examples: Fill 0.11 and 0.89 means only copy orders with price between 0.11 and 0.89; Fill only max price 0.89 means only copy orders with price below 0.89; Fill only min price 0.11 means only copy orders with price above 0.11.
copyTradingAdd.minPricePlaceholder: Min Price (leave empty for no limit)
copyTradingAdd.maxPricePlaceholder: Max Price (leave empty for no limit)
copyTradingAdd.maxPositionValueTooltip: Limit the maximum position value for a single market. If the current position value + copy order amount exceeds this limit, the order will not be placed. Leave empty to disable
copyTradingAdd.maxPositionValuePlaceholder: For example: 100 (optional, leave empty to disable)
copyTradingAdd.maxPositionCountTooltip: Limit the maximum position count for a single market. If the current position count reaches or exceeds this limit, the order will not be placed. Leave empty to disable
copyTradingAdd.maxPositionCountPlaceholder: For example: 10 (optional, leave empty to disable)
copyTradingAdd.configNameTooltip: Set a name for the copy trading configuration for easy identification and management
copyTradingAdd.pushFailedOrdersTooltip: When enabled, failed orders will be pushed to Telegram
copyTradingAdd.autoRedeemTooltip: When enabled, the system will automatically redeem redeemable positions. Requires Builder API Key configuration to take effect
copyTradingAdd.builderApiKeyNotConfiguredDesc: Auto redeem feature requires Builder API Key configuration to take effect.
copyTradingAdd.supportSellTooltip: Whether to copy Leader's sell orders
copyTradingAdd.createFailed: Failed to create copy trading config

notificationSettings.title: Notification Settings
notificationSettings.chatIdsPlaceholder: Chat IDs (click button above to auto-fetch, or enter manually, separate multiple with commas)
notificationSettings.chatIdsRequired: Please enter at least one Chat ID
notificationSettings.chatIdsExtra: Multiple Chat IDs separated by commas, e.g., 123456789,987654321. Click button above to auto-fetch (need to send message to bot first)
notificationSettings.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this configuration?
notificationSettings.testSuccess: Test message sent successfully, please check Telegram
notificationSettings.getChatIdsNoMessage: Chat ID not found, please send a message to the bot first (e.g., /start), then retry

telegramConfig.title: Telegram Configuration Guide
telegramConfig.step1: Create a Telegram bot via @BotFather and get Bot Token
telegramConfig.step2: After entering Bot Token, click 'Get Chat ID' button to auto-fetch (need to send message to bot first)
telegramConfig.step3: Or manually get Chat ID via @userinfobot
telegramConfig.step4: Support multiple Chat IDs (separated by commas), all configured users will receive notifications
telegramConfig.step5: Telegram messages will be sent automatically when orders succeed or fail

discordConfig.title: Discord Configuration Guide
discordConfig.step1: Create a Webhook in Discord server
discordConfig.step2: Copy Webhook URL and enter in configuration
discordConfig.step3: Discord messages will be sent automatically when orders succeed or fail

slackConfig.title: Slack Configuration Guide
slackConfig.step1: Create an Incoming Webhook in Slack workspace
slackConfig.step2: Copy Webhook URL and enter in configuration
slackConfig.step3: Slack messages will be sent automatically when orders succeed or fail
